data.event: The town was originally created in 1851, and was officially named after Erasmus D. Campbell, a former Lieutenant Governor of Wisconsin.

event.title: Today, the Town of Campbell is confined

data.event: Today, the Town of Campbell is confined to part of a large island bordered by the Mississippi and Black rivers and Lake Onalaska.
Joseph French, one of the earliest settlers of the town arrived in May 1851.
